content:
For serif and sans-serif font pairings that work well together, here are some suggestions:

1. Georgia and Helvetica: This is a classic pairing that creates a professional and modern look.

2. PT Serif and Open Sans: PT Serif is an elegant serif font with a slightly condensed style that pairs well with the clean and modern style of Open Sans.

3. Palatino and Lato: Palatino is a classic serif font with a traditional style that pairs well with the contemporary and clean style of Lato.

4. Baskerville and Roboto: Baskerville is a refined serif font with traditional features that pairs well with the modern and sleek style of Roboto.

Remember to adjust the font sizes and weights to create a balanced and consistent hierarchy on your website. And always test your font choices for legibility and readability on different devices and screen sizes.
